name: function 10
func:
let index = context.get("index") || 0;

const dayData = [
    // Hour:   T   H   P   C   L   W
    {temp: 14, hum: 90, pressure : 1000, co2: 300, lux: 100, wind: 5},    // 0 AM
    {temp: 13, hum: 92, pressure : 990, co2: 280, lux: 100, wind: 6},
    {temp: 12, hum: 93, pressure : 980, co2: 250, lux: 100, wind: 4},
    {temp: 12, hum: 94, pressure : 980, co2: 260, lux: 100, wind: 4},
    {temp: 13, hum: 93, pressure : 980, co2: 280, lux: 500, wind: 5},
    {temp: 15, hum: 90, pressure : 990, co2: 320, lux: 1500, wind: 7},   // 5 AM
    {temp: 18, hum: 85, pressure : 1000, co2: 400, lux: 4000, wind: 10},
    {temp: 22, hum: 70, pressure : 1010, co2: 450, lux: 6000, wind: 12},
    {temp: 25, hum: 60, pressure : 1010, co2: 500, lux: 8000, wind: 15},
    {temp: 28, hum: 55, pressure : 1010, co2: 520, lux: 9000, wind: 18},
    {temp: 30, hum: 50, pressure : 1000, co2: 550, lux: 10000, wind: 20}, // 10 AM
    {temp: 31, hum: 48, pressure : 990, co2: 600, lux: 9500, wind: 22},
    {temp: 32, hum: 45, pressure : 980, co2: 650, lux: 9000, wind: 25},
    {temp: 31, hum: 50, pressure : 980, co2: 680, lux: 8000, wind: 22},
    {temp: 29, hum: 55, pressure : 990, co2: 600, lux: 7000, wind: 18},
    {temp: 27, hum: 60, pressure : 1000, co2: 550, lux: 6000, wind: 15},
    {temp: 25, hum: 65, pressure : 1000, co2: 520, lux: 4000, wind: 12}, // 4 PM
    {temp: 22, hum: 70, pressure : 1010, co2: 500, lux: 2000, wind: 10},
    {temp: 20, hum: 75, pressure : 1010, co2: 480, lux: 1000, wind: 8},
    {temp: 18, hum: 80, pressure : 1000, co2: 450, lux: 500, wind: 6},
    {temp: 16, hum: 85, pressure : 1000, co2: 400, lux: 200, wind: 5},
    {temp: 15, hum: 87, pressure : 990, co2: 350, lux: 100, wind: 4},    // 9 PM
    {temp: 14, hum: 88, pressure : 990, co2: 330, lux: 50, wind: 3},
    {temp: 14, hum: 90, pressure : 990, co2: 300, lux: 50, wind: 3}
];
; // paste the array above here

msg.payload = dayData[index];

// Advance to next index
index = (index + 1) % dayData.length;
context.set("index", index);


return msg;
